mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NUM, Q_NUM, REQUEST_NUM, MEMBER_ID, CONTENT, PASSWORD, WRITER_NAME, C_IDX FROM COMMENTS WHERE REQUEST_NUM = #{requestNum} ORDER BY C_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (REVIEW_NUM, Q_NUM, REQUEST_NUM, MEMBER_ID, CONTENT, PASSWORD, WRITER_NAME, C_IDX) VALUES (#{reviewNum}, #{qNum}, #{requestNum}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{password}, #{writerName}, COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL) WHERE REQUEST_NUM = #{requestNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET CONTENT = #{content} WHERE REQUEST_NUM = #{requestNum}
